sentences.en: His measure of success is his students'capacity to regurgitate factual data.
sentences.cn: 而他成功的标杆是他的学生反刍事实数据的能力.

sentences.en: Some birds and animals regurgitate food to feed their young.
sentences.cn: 有些鸟兽会回吐食物以喂哺幼崽。

sentences.en: The mainstream media also tends to regurgitate the same ol'stats and angles and you.
sentences.cn: 主流媒体还趋向于反刍老旧的数据和角度和你.

sentences.en: The valve regurgitate flow usually occur in multiple mainveins in DDVI, and in femoral veins in DVI.
sentences.cn: DDVI组发生返流瓣膜组合是以多条大静脉同时出现为主,而DVI组则以单根为主.

sentences.en: With bellies full of small fish, will regurgitate a portion for waiting chicks.
sentences.cn: 它们满腹小鱼, 会吐出其中一部分,来哺育在家等待的小企鹅.

trans.tran_en: to bring food that you have already swallowed, back into your mouth

trans.tran_cn: 使反胃，使反哺，使反刍，依样复述
trans.tran_en: to bring food that you have already swallowed, back into your mouth
